name: Halloween Knight
description: Halloween Knight is a hack n' slash adventure game mixed with tower defenses where you try to protect your house on Halloween night. You can switch between melee, ranged, and magical attacks on the fly while you battle against the hordes of monsters attacking your house and you.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 940 mx Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: I've basically made this game on an i7 laptop with a 940MX nvidia card. It runs just fine for me with 100+ zombies on screen. It doesn't take much!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX something DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
